thread.title: Beautiful Paris, Beautiful Hotel!
thread.title_full: Beautiful Paris, Beautiful Hotel! - Review of B Montmartre Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: fer0102
title: Beautiful Paris, Beautiful Hotel!
text:
This is a great hotel, the service is amazing, the staff is super nice, they truly care about your stay and your comfort and the breakfast is delicious.
The rooms are big enough and they are super cozy, would definitely go back to this hotel!
Room Tip: Try the breakfast buffet, is DELICIOUS! See more room tips
